tasks.label: Copy Project Source Code for LLM
tasks.command: Get-ChildItem -Recurse -File | Where-Object { $_.FullName -notmatch '[\\/](__pycache__|\.venv|\.git|\.vscode|node_modules)[\\/]' } | ForEach-Object { Write-Output ('--- FILE: ' + $_.FullName.Replace($PWD.Path, '').TrimStart('\')); Write-Output ('```' + $_.Extension.Trim('.')); Get-Content -Raw $_.FullName -Encoding UTF8; Write-Output '```'; Write-Output '' } | Set-Clipboard
